message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $140. What do you think?

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share it. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $130. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking to get a bit more for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
Hello Alice, I've considered your proposal and while I'm still looking for the best deal, I'm willing to offer $132 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
